data.title: Dr. Stanislava Ivanova
data.meta_description: SciProfiles provides open access to the scholarly community, offering comprehensive profiles where researchers can highlight their academic life, contributions, and share ideas freely. Most likely shall be updated again when we have the content strategy.
data.text:
Dr. Stanislava Ivanova joined the Department of Pharmacognosy and Pharmaceutical Chemistry, Medical University of Plovdiv in September 2013 as an assistant professor and became an associate professor in November 2017. She is a member of the Kalin Ivanov’s Lab. Her skills and expertise mainly include steroids, nutritional supplements, exercise performance, sports medicine, high-performance liquid chromatography, ultra-high-performance liquid chromatography (UHPLC), pharmaceutical analysis, pharmaceutical chemistry, gas chromatography-mass spectrometry, and medicinal and pharmaceutical chemistry.
